tool_description: Applies selected valuation methodologies to adjusted comparable sales data and generates property value estimates using multiple approaches.

comparable_sale_prices.description: Original sale prices of comparable properties

total_adjustments.description: Total adjustment amounts for each comparable

valuation_method.description: Primary valuation method: mean, median, weighted_average, or regression

exclude_outliers.description: Whether to exclude statistical outliers from valuation

error_messages: Array length mismatch: comparable_sale_prices and total_adjustments must have the same number of elements.
Invalid proximity weights: If provided, proximity_weights array must match comparable arrays length and contain values between 0.1 and 1.0.
Insufficient data: At least one comparable sale is required for valuation.
Invalid valuation method: Use one of: mean, median, weighted_average, or regression.
Invalid sale prices: All sale prices must be positive integers greater than 0.
usage: Provide arrays of comparable sale prices and their corresponding adjustment amounts. Optionally specify proximity weights, valuation method, and outlier handling. Returns calculated property value estimates.

value_range_low.description: Lower bound of estimated value range

value_range_high.description: Upper bound of estimated value range

adjusted_comparable_values.description: Adjusted values for each comparable property

method_used.description: Valuation method applied for primary estimate

confidence_level.description: Confidence level: high, medium, or low
